class.name: B4R::B4RCONCEPTINETICS
class.comment: File: rConceptinetics Date: 20240601 Partial wrapper for the Conceptinetics library - only the DMX_Master class.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the DMX Master controller using hardware serial 1 (as set in conceptinetics.h). master_channels - number of master channels 1 - 512 (default 100). rxen_pin - pin to control the write operation on the bus (default 2). IMPORTANT: Ensure to initialize prior Serial1. Example: Sub Process_Globals Private dmx_master As DMXMaster Public Serial1 As Serial Private Sub AppStart dmx_master.Initialize(10, dmx_master.RXEN_PIN) Serial1.Initialize(115200)

method.name: SetChannelValue
method.comment: SetChannelValue by writing to the channel. channel - channel number from the range set in initialize. value - channel value between 0-255. Example: dmx_master.SetChannelValue(4, 10)

method.name: SetChannelLevel
method.comment: SetChannelLevel by writing to the channel. channel - channel number from the range set in initialize. level - value level between 0-100%. Example: dmx_master.SetChannelLevel(4, 50)

method.name: SetChannelOff
method.comment: SetChannel Off by writing 0 to the channel. channel - channel number from the range set in initialize. Example: dmx_master.SetChannelOff(2)

method.name: SetChannelRange
method.comment: SetChannelRange to a value. start - start number of the channel range. end - end number of the channel range. value - value between 0-255 assigned to the channel range. Example: dmx_master.SetChannelRange(2, 4, 10)

method.name: SetRGB
method.comment: SetRGB by writing to the RGB channels. red/green/blue_channel - channel number from the range set in initialize. red/green/blue_value - color value between 0-255. Example: dmx_master.SetRGB(3,4,5,10,20,30)

method.name: SetRGBOff
method.comment: SetRGB off by writing 0 to the RGB channels. red/green/blue_channel - channel number from the range set in initialize. Example: dmx_master.SetRGBOff(3,4,5)

field.name: B4RCONCEPTINETICS_DMX_MASTER_CHANNELS
field.comment: Default number of channels (100) the master will control. This depends on free memory available (minimum 1).

field.name: B4RCONCEPTINETICS_RXEN_PIN
field.comment: Default pin number (2) to change read or write mode on the shield.

field.name: B4RCONCEPTINETICS_CHANNEL_DIMMER
field.comment: Default channel number for the Dimmer, Red, Green, Blue
